message.entry: This mode is not supported for the GPU-based Viterbi Decoder.
The input must be real-valued, with a built-in floating-point datatype (double or single).
The input vector length must be a multiple of NumFrames for Terminated or Truncated mode.
The TracebackDepth property must be less than or equal to the number of symbols in the input.
The input vector length must be a multiple of the symbol length (n=log2 (numInputSymbols))
The input vector length must be a multiple of the symbol length (n=log2 (numInputSymbols)) and the number of 1s in the puncture pattern.
The reset signal must be a double precision, single precision, or logical scalar.
The puncture pattern length must be an integer multiple of the codeword size,\nlog2(<object handle>.TrellisStructure.numOutputSymbols).
Only rate 1/n codes from simple feedforward encoders are supported.
The code base rate must be 1/2, 1/3, or 1/4.
The constraint length must be a positive integer between 3 and 9.
The traceback depth must be a positive integer less than or equal to 256.
The puncture pattern must be a column vector of 16 or fewer elements containing only 1s and/or 0s.
The DelayedResetAction property can only be set to false.
The ErasuresInputPort property can only be set to false.
